bill.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 2670) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2024 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, and for defense activities of the Department of Energy, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.
bill.description: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 2670) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2024 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, and for defense activities of the Department of Energy, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.

history.action: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 118-142, by Mr. Cole.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 29.

The resolution provides for further consideration of H. R. 2670 under a structured rule. The resolution makes in order only those further amendments printed in House Report 118-142. One motion to recommit provided.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 583.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 583, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice announced the ayes had prevailed. Mr. McGovern demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 207 (Roll no. 295).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 208 (Roll no. 296).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

votes.desc: On Ordering the Previous Question RC# 295
On Agreeing to the Resolution RC# 296
